text: Robin Simone Givens (born November 27, 1964 New York City) is an American stage, television and movie actress. Her acting began in 1985 beginning with sitcoms The Cosby Show and Diff'rent Strokes. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:African-American actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors
title: Robin Givens
